title: "Adani Group, Prisma AI Partner to Improve Airport Travel with AI"
excerpt: "Prisma AI and the Adani Group initially introduced the innovative “Desk of Goodness” system at the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (SVPIA) in Ahmedabad and have expanded it to five more airports. The system significantly enhances passenger assistance and safety in departure and pre-security areas at SVPIA."
